slides.title: Blockchain Gardens
slides.description_short: Blockchain Gardens is a real-time 3D visualization of a private Ethereum blockchain instance running at an annual tech conference that records every booth an attendee visits via RFID readers.

slides.title: RockstAR
slides.description_short: RockstAR is an interactive AR experience that couples the power of Microsoft's HoloLens, Philips Hue Lightbulbs, and a series of stage technologies to give users the ability to customize a live rock band experience.

slides.title: Vender VR
slides.description_short: Vender is an IoT connected vending machine. Adam expanded Vender to the virtual world, creating the first ever VR vending machine experience where vending a drink in VR would vend the same drink in real-life.
